Uses of Class
org.ow2.bonita.facade.exception.ActivityNotFoundException

Packages that use ActivityNotFoundException
org.ow2.bonita.facade Contains interfaces for accessing Bonita APIs. 
org.ow2.bonita.facade.internal All interfaces in this package are for internal use only.

          Returns records for all iterations and multi-instantiations that should append for the given process instance UUID and activity Id.
An empty set is returned if no instance is found.

 void RuntimeAPI.setActivityInstanceVariable(ActivityInstanceUUID activityUUID, java.lang.String variableId, java.lang.Object variableValue)
          Searches for variable with the given activity UUID and variable Id.
If the activity variable is found, the given value is set.
For XML types, see RuntimeAPI.setVariable(ActivityInstanceUUID, String, Object).
 void RuntimeAPI.setVariable(ActivityInstanceUUID activityUUID, java.lang.String variableId, java.lang.Object variableValue)
           Searches for variable with id variableId within the given activity instance with the given UUID.
If the variable is found within the activity, the given value is set.
If the variable is not found within the activity the search is performed within the process instance.
If the variable is found within the process instance, the given value is set.
 void RuntimeAPI.startActivity(ActivityInstanceUUID activityUUID)
          Starts the activity.
 ActivityInstanceUUID RepairAPI.startExecution(ProcessInstanceUUID instanceUUID, java.lang.String activityName)
          Starts a new execution in a process instance at a specific activity, with a map of instance’s variable values.
 void RepairAPI.stopExecution(ProcessInstanceUUID instanceUUID, java.lang.String activityName)
          Stops all the active executions for an activity of a given instance.
 void RuntimeAPI.updateActivityExpectedEndDate(ActivityInstanceUUID activityUUID, java.util.Date expectedEndDate)
          Updates the expected date when the activity should finish.

 void AbstractRemoteRuntimeAPI.setVariable(ActivityInstanceUUID activityUUID, java.lang.String variableId, java.lang.Object variableValue, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> options)
           Searches for variable with id variableId within the given activity instance with the given UUID.
If the variable is found within the activity, the given value is set.
If the variable is not found within the activity the search is performed within the process instance.
If the variable is found within the process instance, the given value is set.
